name: Education Everywhere
about: Support these highly impactful nonprofits, using evidence-based solutions to improve education for children around the world.

sponsor.description: Amplify your giving! We will match your generous donation dollar-for-dollar up to $25 each time until we reach $10,000 total matched! You can donate as many times as you like. Matching funds are kindly provided by Every.org

nonprofits.name: Teaching at the Right Level (TaRL Africa)
nonprofits.about: Supports governments across Africa to adapt and scale up an evidence-based approach to improving studentsâ€™ foundational skills.

nonprofits.name: Iodine Global Network
nonprofits.about: Dedicated to the sustainable elimination of iodine deficiency worldwide.

nonprofits.name: Educational Initiatives
nonprofits.about: Supporting students and teachers with affordable, accessible tech to improve educational outcomes.

nonprofits.name: Code Crew
nonprofits.about: To empower and mentor those most underrepresented in tech, to be tech innovators through hands-on computer science training.
